title: FOUNDERS' DAY Official Attendance
body_text:
To me, it's more clear than ever that the word "dodgeball" truly means "gathering." Sure it's competitive and great exercise, but the everlasting friendships we've all made and kept undoubtedly mean the most.
Did you seriously ever think we'd be playing almost 17 years - even just once a year - with your own kids?? It's beyond incredible, and I'm eternally grateful.
body_html:
